metadata.name: Hurt Chiki
metadata.description:
June 11th, 2023

my friend Chiki Chan got Hapa Hate-crimed left with severe PTSD and mental dibilitation that caused her already broken WMAF family to fall into bankrupcy and homelessness upon paying for medical bills and therapy.

Ive hand-drawn this special honorary for Chiki in order to help raise funds to rehabilitate her. 

This will go on auction and all funds will go to Chiki as reperations for the terrible crime she suffered on 6/11.

an Announcement for when the auction will be live will be made on @hapa_maker and her twitter account @chinky_666 .

By caring for a hurt hapa, you are making a happy hapa! Thank you for Caring ~
